comments.content: I think it's [Mic 32](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202085613/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/moretype/mic_32_new_medium_italic_pro/). There are some minor differencesâ€”the sample was probably set in the older (pre-'New') version of the typeface, which I think you can still get from Moretype directly.

Just had this identification confirmed by [Chris Dickinson](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202085613/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/designer/chris_dickinson/) himself. Good one, Ivan. ;^)

\> _Yes that is the original version of Mic 32._
